name: Captain Cook's sPacific Adventures
description:
IMPORTANT! - I forgot to code a method of exiting the game. To exit, you must pres the CTRL+ALT+TAB keys together which will let you choose which window you wish to open up - before choosing a window you will be able to exit the game window by hovering the mouse above the top right corner of the game window.

Captain Cook's Specific adventures

arrow keys to move

Find the map pieces in each level - but watch out! Mind the sea monsters, krakens whirlpools and rocks!

Enjoy!
